name: DialogRoot
description:
Groups all parts of the dialog.
Doesnâ€™t render its own HTML element.

defaultOpen.description:
Whether the dialog is initially open.

To render a controlled dialog, use the `open` prop instead.

open.description: Whether the dialog is currently open.

onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the dialog is opened or closed.

dismissible.description: Determines whether the dialog should close on outside clicks.

onOpenChangeComplete.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the dialog is opened or closed.

trap.description:
How the dialog should trap focus, scroll, and pointer outside presses.
- `all`: trap all interactions inside the dialog.
- `none`: don't trap any interactions.
- `focus`: only trap focus inside the dialog.
